articles.description: It's A Sin star Callum Scott Howells knows all about losing someone you love to a cruel disease as coronavirus has claimed the lives of his grandparents
articles.content:
Callum Scott Howells has shared his heartbreak after losing his grandparents to coronavirus.
The actor, 21, plays Colin in Russell T Davies' powerful Aids drama It's A Sin, and he knows exactly what… [+2761 chars]

articles.author: Severin Carrell
articles.title: Edinburgh book festival to quit New Town for art school - The Guardian
articles.description: Festival cites Covid and costs of staging event heavily dependent on live audiences as reason for move
articles.content:
For nearly 40 years, the Edinburgh book festival has been held in a small tented city in Edinburghs Georgian New Town, its audiences sweltering in the summer sun or drenched by sudden downpours.
